Announcements











Salary increase for policy-covered staff and academic employees
Dear Campus Community,
 
Thank you for your continued contributions to the overall success of UC Riverside. Through your dedication and commitment, we continue to thrive in our research, teaching, and service missions. The momentum that we continue to build positions UCR as a university of choice for both students and employees.
 


April 25, 2023

Dear Highlander Community,
